duties_responsibilities.duty: Collaborate with clients and various studios to deliver retail design projects and client support.
Support clients in the development of retail stores, programs, and fixtures across creative, prototyping, engineering, production, and deployment phases.
Work alongside clients to capture information and develop detailed documentation within a deadline-driven environment.
Participate in budget development and monitor expenses for retail design projects.
Review and comprehend architectural, engineering, and technical drawings.
Produce detailed documentation by partnering with internal 3D, architectural, and creative studios.
Manage the company's online presence, optimizing the website and social media channels for maximum engagement and conversions.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Retail Design, Architecture, or a related field (Master's preferred)
